name: Enigma Boots
tooltip:
Enigma BootsLevel 60

Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Dominance, 2 Idols of the Sun, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Crystal Scarabs to Kandrostrasz in Ahn'Qiraj.  This quest also requires Neutral faction with the Brood of Nozdormu.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Bindings of Dominance
- Idol of the Sun x 2
- Silver Scarab x 5
- Crystal Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
